document.title: Opening the new feature dialog
document.paragraph:
To make the
../../../reference/70_wizards_and_dialogs/30_dialogs/10_new_feature_dialog/10_overview.xml new feature window appear, you can:
Click
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/new_feature_icon.png in the
../../../reference/05_general_interface_description/30_main_toolbars.xml standard toolbar .
Select New feature in the Tools menu.
Use the
../../../reference/50_diagram_tool/00_introduction.xml diagram tool : First, select create new client-supplier links by clicking on
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/new_supplier_link_icon.png .Then, pick the class to which you want to add the new feature. Lastly, drop the pebble on the class that corresponds to the type returned by the new feature.This last method does not allow you to create procedures.
The first thing to do when the dialog is displayed is to choose the kind of feature you want to create. The rest of the process depends on what you selected :
20_adding_a_procedure.xml procedure ,
30_adding_a_function.xml function or
40_adding_an_attribute.xml attribute .
